channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Light Field Lab launches SolidLight holographic imagery systems
item.description: Light Field Lab has launched its SolidLight Holographic and Volumetric display technologies that will power some amazing imagery of the future.

item.title: ‘I want to do the right thing’: My ex-husband is worth 10 times what I’m worth. Is it fair that we contribute equally to our son’s college education?
item.description: “When I suggested I now want to pay less, my former spouse said he didn’t want to finance my savings.”

item.title: AWS now allows prompt caching with 90% cost reduction
